translations: 缺乏活力，惰性；无变化；惯性

phrs.translation: 热惰性；热惯性（温升速率的倒数）；热惯量
转动惯量；转动惯性；惯性矩
惯性力矩，惯性矩；惰性力矩

sentences.sentence: In chapter two, it includes some impontant forms of sign pattern matrix inertias and research trends of inertia.
sentences.translation: 第二章介绍符号模式矩阵的惯量所具有的几类重要形式以及惯量研究的动态。

sentences.sentence: This paper discusses the effect of the inertias in control loop on the steady-state stability of generator excitation optimal control system.
sentences.translation: 本文讨论了发电机励磁最优控制线路中存在的惯性对系统静态稳定性的影响。

sentences.sentence: The effects of high order motions of reciprocating parts on the variation of inertias and natural frequencies of crankshaft system are discussed in this paper.
sentences.translation: 本文分析了内燃机曲柄连杆机构往复运动件的高谐次运动对轴系惯量变化和固有频率的影响，并对一多缸机轴系进行了扭振计算。
